rule.description: Size computation for allocation may overflow
rule.name: go/allocation-size-overflow

message.text: This operation, which is used in an allocation, involves a potentially large value and might overflow.
This regular expression has an unescaped dot before 'net', so it might match more hosts than expected when the regular expression is used.
This regular expression has an unescaped dot before 'net', so it might match more hosts than expected when the regular expression is used.
This regular expression has an unescaped dot before 'IO', so it might match more hosts than expected when the regular expression is used.
When this is used as a regular expression on a URL, it may match anywhere, and arbitrary hosts may come before or after it.
